name: Cyber Flaslight
description:
Description:

This game was made for Mini Jam 121: Reflection

You play as cyber flashlight in a room full of evil bugs who are jealous of you because they don't have such a cool light. Use the reflections from windows to protect yourself from envious.

Controls:

WASD and Mouse - Movement. 

R - Restart. 

F1 - Post Processing. 

F2 - Flashing Lights.

F10 - Full Screen.
